paper_abstract: Analytical relations were derived for analyzing the selectivity of consecutive-parallel reactions occurring under conditions of the reforming process. With these relations it is also possible to determine how the shape of the catalyst grain, as well as the kinetic and diffusion phenomena that govern the process, affects the efficiency of the desired final products. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Effect of the diffusion phenomena in the catalyst grain on the selectivity of a system of parallel-consecutive reactions involved in the process of n-heptane dehydrocyclization
